divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside in my balcony smoking a cigarrete, i looked up at the sky and there was nothing as in stars or a moon or clouds it was very clear there was only 3 lights on the sky in the form of a triangle i stood there for about one minute looking at it and then i ran back inside my apartment to tell my wife about it so that she could come out and look at it so that when i told her she wouldnt think i was crazy. and i also got my binoculars so i could see it better and when i went to look at it and focus it right it was gone, when i came outside i saw it again and when i tried to focuss on it with my binoculars it moved at a very high rate of speed it moved to another position in the sky but it was stremely fast then i took my binoculars of my face and sure there it was at a different spot then were i had seen it to begin with then when i tried to focuss on it again at where it had moved to it moved again back to place where i had first seen it then i saw it for about 30 seconds and i ran back in the house to tell my wife that she had to see that cause it was something that u dont see everyday and she was still to scared and denied to come outside with me so i got mad at her cause i really wanted her to see it so i ran back outside and it was still there but there was no more movement by that time my heart was pounding so hard cause i had no clue what it was and i said to my self there is nothing in this world that can move that fast and just be standing there and i was really scared i was shacking my eyes could not believe what i was seeing and just like that in the blink of an eye it was gone i didnt see it leaving or nothing i dont know if the lights just went off or it flew away i have no clue just that fast it was gone. but what really inpressed me was the speed it moved with it was something really out of this world and i could not sleep for a whole week or more i kept dreaming about it the only one that listen to me was my boss at work ............ thank you for letting me get this of my chest!!!!!!!!!!! please if there is anyway i would like for someone to contact me so i can tell them my story cause i swear on everuthing i love i know what i saw and im not lying all i want to do is let u guys know what i saw u dont even have to public this its just to get it out of chest like i said. my number is 918-406-5907 thank you i will be specting your call Erick Sanchez
Summary: I saw 3 lights in for of a triangle
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Catoosa
There were no other sightings in Catoosa on or around October 15th 2008
